sections.heading: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect personal information that you provide to us directly and data collected automatically through your use of the site.

sections.heading: 2. How We Use Information
sections.content: We use your data to provide, improve, and personalize our services, as well as to communicate with you.

sections.heading: 3. Sharing Your Information
sections.content: We do not sell your information. We may share it with trusted third parties to help operate our service.

sections.heading: 4. Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data. Contact us to exercise these rights.

sections.heading: 5. Contact
sections.content: If you have questions about this policy, please reach out to contact@dripnex.app.
